name: mozservices
description: Micro service architecture with JWT implementation, based on zeit/micro

scripts.api: nodemon --watch src/api.js --exec node -r babel-register -r babel-polyfill node_modules/.bin/micro -p 3000 src/api.js
scripts.auth: nodemon --watch src/auth.js --exec node -r babel-register -r babel-polyfill node_modules/.bin/micro -p 3001 src/auth.js
scripts.hello: nodemon --watch src/hello.js --exec node -r babel-register -r babel-polyfill node_modules/.bin/micro -p 3011 src/hello.js
scripts.world: nodemon --watch src/world.js --exec node -r babel-register -r babel-polyfill node_modules/.bin/micro -p 3012 src/world.js
scripts.all: concurrent --raw --kill-others "npm run hello" "npm run world" "npm run auth" "npm run api"

author: Maurice Faber <morriz@idiotz.nl>
